about_the_game: Embark on an electrifying journey through twisting labyrinths, where strategy and suspense converge in an adrenaline-fueled race against time and intellect. In both PvP and PvE modes, players can dive into the enigmatic world of mazes alone or join forces in multiplayer challenges. At the heart of this high-stakes adventure is Maziantor, an advanced robot crafted by the world's leading artificial intelligence company, MythicMinds AI, designed to decode the secrets of ancient, cryptic mazes. As players guide Mazinator through the intricate pathways, they'll uncover hidden ancient powers, each unlocking unique abilities that transform the robot into an even more formidable navigator. Whether you're a lone explorer or teaming up with others, Mazinator promises a cerebral battle and heart-pounding excitement as you outmaneuver opponents and unravel the mysteries that lie within the walls.

name: Mazinator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 CPU @ 3.00GHz ; Shader Model 5
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Earth, once verdant and teeming with life, now lies in ruin, its surface scarred by the devastating impact of a rogue comet. MythicMinds AI emerges as the unlikely harbinger of salvation. With humanity's future hanging in the balance, it has converged to conceive a daring solution: Mazinator.
